renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/clc3WM
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/cl33WM

#define S(s) clamp( .5+ .5*s/fwidth(s), 0., 1. ) // draw AA strips

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y,                // normalized coordinates
          T = ( U + vec2(-U.y,U) ) *.707,       // 45Â°-tilted ( for cross )
          V = abs( T ),                         // + symmetry 
          A = abs( U ); A.x -= .707;            // symmetries ( for loops )
    float l = length(A), x = A.x/l,
          s = x > -.7 ? l-.5 : V.y < .2 ? T.y : T.x, // local parameterization
          t = x > -.7 ? atan(U.y,abs(U.x)-.707)/1.7 :  V.y < .2 ? T.x : -T.y;
          
    O =  clamp(R.yyyy/3. 
               * (.2 - abs( x > -.7             // .2- : thickness
                            ? l - .5            // loops SDF
                            : min(V.x,V.y)      // cross SDF
                        ) ) ,0.,1.)
               *  S(cos(140.*s))                // AA strips along v loc param
               *  S(cos( 50.*t - 5.*iTime));    // AA strips along u loc param
}
renderpass.name: Image
